nodes.text: The Entropian Hive was an asteroid used as a black market trading post, controlled by the Entropian Hive Trading Council. Yrica Quell was sent to the Entropian Hive by Caern Adan to recruit Nath Tensent, former Rebel Alliance pilot, into the New Republic.

The Entropian Hive first appeared in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed. When creating the location, Freed wanted to establish a "sleazy cantina"-like place for Yrica Quell to meet Nath Tensent which felt unique to the post-Battle of Endor period.
